entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Greenstone (Nakina)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:45 AM EDT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Snow, -14.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Geraldton Airport 12:00 PM EDT Friday 17 March 2023
Condition: Snow
Temperature: -14.2°C
Pressure: 100.3 kPa
Visibility: 0.6 km
Humidity: 81 %
Wind Chill: -25
Dewpoint: -16.8°C
Wind: NNE 30 km/h gust 63 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Temperature steady near minus 13.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature steady near minus 13. Wind chill near minus 26. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow and blowing snow. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Snow and blowing snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 17. Wind chill near minus 28. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 9. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 60 percent chance of flurries. Blowing snow in the morning. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 29 in the morning and minus 16 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Friday 17 March 2023
